metadata.title: CVE-2024-36973 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:misc: microchip: pci1xxxx: fix double free in the error handling ofgp_aux_bus_probe()When auxiliary_device_add() returns error and then callsauxiliary_device_uninit(), callback functiongp_auxiliary_device_release() calls ida_free() andkfree(aux_device_wrapper) to free memory. We should'tcall them again in the error handling path.Fix this by skipping the redundant cleanup functions.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
